response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it provides, I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire such a high-quality product at a price that reflects its true value while also offering you considerable savings. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
